title: Understanding Ethical Considerations
text: Ethical considerations in data analysis often involve respecting the rights and privacy of individuals whose data is being used.

title: Focus on Privacy and Consent
text: In data analysis, ensuring that customer data is used ethically involves obtaining consent from individuals and protecting their privacy.

title: Identifying Ethical Practices
text: Ethical practices in data analysis prioritize the protection of personal information and require explicit consent from data subjects before using their data.

hintAnswer: Ensuring customer data privacy and obtaining consent for data use
title: Choosing the Correct Ethical Consideration
text: Among the options, the one that emphasizes customer data privacy and obtaining consent is the correct ethical consideration.
choices: Ensuring customer data privacy and obtaining consent for data use
Using the latest data analysis software
Maximizing the number of data points collected
